summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4206 for the improvement of East Lynn Street, from 26th Avenue North, on the south to approximately 190 feet east of 26th Avenue North on the north; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49974, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
